results.title: Reversal of memory deficits by Atorvastatin and Simvastatin in rats.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@Atorvastatin@@@ (5 mg kg(-1) orally) as well as @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ (5 mg kg(-1) orally) significantly attenuated @CHEMICAL_Alprazolam @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000525 @@@Alprazolam@@@, @CHEMICAL_Scopolamine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012601 @@@Scopolamine@@@ and HFD induced @<m>DISEASE_Amnesia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000647 @@@amnesia@@@.
